meanings.sent1: The nondividing rope remained whole and unbroken.
meanings.sent2: The nondividing cookie was shared equally among the children.
meanings.sent3: The nondividing puzzle piece refused to fit anywhere!
meanings.sent4: Her nondividing loyalty to her friends was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The nondividing rock stood firm against the crashing waves.

meanings.sent1: The nondividing cells in the body stayed the same size.
meanings.sent2: The nondividing bacteria were not multiplying rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The nondividing amoeba decided to take a break from splitting.
meanings.sent4: His nondividing hair seemed to defy the aging process.
meanings.sent5: The nondividing plant remained small and unchanged in the pot.
